# Fonts Directory

This directory should contain the following font files:

## CooperBlack
- `CooperBlack-Regular.otf` - OpenType font file
- `CooperBlack-Regular.ttf` - TrueType font file (optional)

**Source**: https://github.com/indestructible-type/Cooper

**Download**: The font is currently loaded via CDN in the CSS. To use local files instead:
1. Download from: https://github.com/indestructible-type/Cooper/tree/main/fonts
2. Place `CooperBlack-Regular.otf` and/or `CooperBlack-Regular.ttf` in this directory
3. The CSS will automatically use local files if available

## Selfie Printed
- Currently loaded via WebFontFree CDN script in `index.html`
- If you want to host locally, download from: https://www.webfontfree.com/en/download/Selfie-Printed
- Place WOFF2 or WOFF files in this directory and update the CSS @font-face declaration
